医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Sapio Sciences 扩大与 AWS 的合作以推进 Science-Aware™ AI 视觉https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Sapio-Sciences-Expands-Collaboration-With-AWS-to-Advance-Science-Awaree284a2-AI-Vision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Sapio-Sciences-Expands-Collaboration-With-AWS-to-Advance-Science-Awaree284a2-AI-Vision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bc7db01-efdc-48a0-b68f-7fdf3d67776d Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:54:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences Expands Collaboration With AWS to Advance Science-Aware™ AI Vision
铁补充剂可能促进艾滋病毒儿童的大脑发育明尼苏达大学医学院的一个研究小组发现，为撒哈拉以南非洲地区感染人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）的儿童提供铁补充剂可能是优化大脑发育的重要第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Iron-supplements-may-boost-brain-development-in-children-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Iron-supplements-may-boost-brain-development-in-children-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec527bbe-1b4f-4125-b9e7-6b7516a85bc0 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:45:02 -0400 Iron supplements may boost brain development in children with HIV
两种局部治疗对手部光老化显示出相似的益处美国整形外科学会官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》11 月号的一项临床试验报告称，局部使用含有人血小板提取物或维生素 C 的产品可类似地改善手部老年斑（光老化）。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Two-topical-treatments-show-similar-benefits-for-photoaging-of-the-hands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Two-topical-treatments-show-similar-benefits-for-photoaging-of-the-hands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b506cef-4ff5-425b-95b7-64ff6c926d42 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:37:30 -0400 Two topical treatments show similar benefits for photoaging of the hands
思想年轻，保持敏锐？积极的老龄化前景与改善的认知自我认知有关研究表明，积极的衰老预期与认知健康的改善和主观衰退的减少相关，强调了心态的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Think-young-stay-sharp-Positive-aging-outlook-tied-to-improved-cognitive-self-perception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Think-young-stay-sharp-Positive-aging-outlook-tied-to-improved-cognitive-self-perception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d897112-7fc6-48d5-925c-88a977c94159 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:37:00 -0400 Think young, stay sharp? Positive aging outlook tied to improved cognitive self-perception
针灸有望缓解慢性肠易激综合症的症状最近的一项随机对照试验揭示了针灸治疗难治性肠易激综合征（IBS）的功效，IBS 是一种慢性胃肠道疾病，显着影响生活质量，并且通常对常规治疗产生抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Acupuncture-shows-promise-in-allevating-symptoms-of-chronic-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Acupuncture-shows-promise-in-allevating-symptoms-of-chronic-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=368706ba-5a8a-47d9-9b40-df156e90a69c Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:24:00 -0400 Acupuncture shows promise in alleviating symptoms of chronic irritable bowel syndrome
生命早期的低糖饮食可降低成年后患慢性病的风险一项新的研究发现，子宫内和生命前两年的低糖饮食可以有效降低成年后患慢性病的风险，这为生命早期摄入糖分对终生健康的影响提供了令人信服的新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Low-sugar-diet-in-early-life-reduces-risk-of-chronic-diseases-in-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Low-sugar-diet-in-early-life-reduces-risk-of-chronic-diseases-in-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5be1dd2-bde0-419f-a665-95ca174f058c Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:11:22 -0400 Low-sugar diet in early life reduces risk of chronic diseases in adulthood
嗅觉丧失可以预测疾病吗？研究表明嗅觉丧失与 139 种健康状况有关嗅觉功能障碍与 139 种病症有关，其中炎症在记忆力下降和认知问题中发挥着关键作用。嗅觉丰富显示出希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Can-olfactory-loss-predict-disease-Study-ties-loss-of-smell-to-139-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Can-olfactory-loss-predict-disease-Study-ties-loss-of-smell-to-139-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e64e60a0-7b4b-4c28-a871-66837bfc83f3 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:06:00 -0400 Can olfactory loss predict disease? Study ties loss of smell to 139 health conditions
创新的注射填充剂为糖尿病伤口治疗带来希望寺崎生物医学创新研究所 (TIBI) 的研究人员开发出一种革命性的可注射颗粒填充剂，可以改变糖尿病伤口的治疗方式，从而有可能改善患者的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Innovative-injectable-filler-offers-hope-for-diabetic-wound-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Innovative-injectable-filler-offers-hope-for-diabetic-wound-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fae847e3-4db2-4621-8929-388465921ccf Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:03:17 -0400 Innovative injectable filler offers hope for diabetic wound treatment
心脏病发作会增加睡眠以帮助康复西奈山的一项新研究表明，心脏病发作会引发更多睡眠的愿望，从而使心脏愈合并减少炎症，这是因为心脏向大脑发送特殊信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Heart-attack-triggers-sleep-increase-to-aid-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Heart-attack-triggers-sleep-increase-to-aid-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9a10371-ad2b-472f-b9a2-7a6c4f0e9e18 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 07:32:46 -0400 Heart attack triggers sleep increase to aid recovery
研究发现产前睡眠质量影响新生儿大脑结构和情绪健康产前睡眠质量显着影响新生儿大脑发育和情绪结果，凸显了有针对性的睡眠干预的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-finds-prenatal-sleep-quality-affects-newborn-brain-struct-and-emotional-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-finds-prenatal-sleep-quality-affects-newborn-brain-struct-and-emotional-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6741f29d-f979-4ee8-bf49-d445d5a76620 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 07:21:00 -0400 Study finds prenatal sleep quality affects newborn brain structure and emotional health
